cobblemon.species.kagurette.name: Kagurette
cobblemon.species.kagurette.desc1: A Pokemon that originated from Gensokyo, it is said a Babette has been seeing so many spirits resulting it to evolve into action.
cobblemon.species.kagurette.desc2: Kagurette does not seem to exist anywhere but Gensokyo, but is said to it will join the rituals and ward off evil spirits.
cobblemon.species.kagurette.desc3: It is quite docile and likes getting along others people including Pokemon, but does not take training seriously.
cobblemon.species.kagurette.desc4: It is lazy but powerful, and it is known for taking down a Rampaging Gyarados with ease.
cobblemon.species.kagurette.desc5: Because of it's docile nature, it resolves incidents by sorting things out, but if being attacked, it will fight back.
